text: hello I'm John fritz at Amazon Web
Services i'd like to invite you to watch
this webinar about best practices for
apache spark on AWS apache spark has
gained tremendous popularity given its
capabilities to address a wide variety
of big data use cases including
real-time streaming analytics ad-hoc
query data science and machine learning
in this webinar will show you how to
deploy and use apache spark on AWS to
address some of these use cases then
we'll go over common architectures and
best practices to create spark clusters
with Amazon EMR an AWS service which
makes it fast easy and cost-effective to
run spark and to do join us and learn
why spark continues to be a great
framework for batch streaming and
interactive Big Data workloads
